aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Welcome to WebSense Consulting, where innovation meets expertise in the world of e-commerce and digital solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: WebSense Consulting was founded by Rodrigo Araujo, a seasoned Technical Lead and a visionary in the field of e-commerce. With over a decade of experience working with industry-leading companies, Rodrigo has honed his skills in front-end architecture, conversion rate optimization (CRO), and search engine optimization (SEO).
story.paragraph2: As the CEO of WebSense Consulting, Rodrigo brings a wealth of knowledge and a passion for innovation to every project. His hands-on experience with platforms like VTEX and Shopify, coupled with a deep understanding of JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, and Vue.js, allows him to deliver cutting-edge solutions that enhance user experience and maximize digital performance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At WebSense Consulting, our mission is to empower businesses to thrive in the digital landscape. We specialize in crafting tailored e-commerce strategies that not only enhance online visibility but also drive revenue growth. Our team of experts is dedicated to providing top-notch consulting services that encompass technical analysis, SEO optimization, CRO techniques, and digital channel management.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Led by Rodrigo Araujo, our team possesses unparalleled knowledge in e-commerce development and digital strategy.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage the latest technologies and methodologies to ensure your digital presence is always ahead of the curve.

results.title: Results-Driven
results.description: Our focus is on delivering measurable results that contribute to your business's success and growth.

services.analysis: Technical Website Analysis: Comprehensive assessments to identify areas for improvement and ensure optimal performance.
services.seo: SEO Optimization: Strategic approaches to enhance search engine visibility and drive organic traffic.
services.cro: CRO Strategies: Implementation of techniques designed to boost conversion rates and improve user experience.
services.ecommerce: E-commerce Development: Custom solutions tailored to your business needs, utilizing platforms like VTEX, Shopify, and more.

cta.title: Join Us on Our Journey
cta.description: At WebSense Consulting, we believe in building lasting partnerships with our clients. We are committed to helping you navigate the complexities of the digital world and achieve your business goals.
cta.contact: Get in touch with us today and discover how WebSense Consulting can transform your digital strategy.
